about_the_game:
PhobLack is a first-person horror exploration game that invites you into the abyss of fear.

In 1980, a plane crashed in the mountainous region of America.
As the only survivor, you must contact the rescue team and request rescue.
Your mapping skills will be tested.

Warning: Please read

What you are exploring is not just a mansion.
It is a ruin filled with curses and conspiracies, where paranormal phenomena that rob you of your sanity swirl.
Avoid the darkness and act calmly.

Game Features

  • Dark and eerie ruins: Explore places where fear breathes.
  • Mysterious security: Numerous inexplicable mechanisms await.
  • Flashlight: Adjustable light intensity (occasionally flickers).
  • Sanity system: Sanity decreases when you feel fear, keeping calm is the key.

If it is too dark, please adjust the brightness from the settings.
When using a controller, the UI is controlled with the cross buttons.
If you have items such as keys in your possession, they will be used automatically by simply pressing the button toward the door.

About live streaming and recorded game commentary videos

On various SNS such as Youtube and TikTok, you can post commentary videos of this game or live video distribution. You do not need to report to me that you have posted a video. If possible, please introduce this game in the description of the video.

Disclaimer

I shall not be responsible for any disadvantage that occurred in relation to this game.

The estimated time required is about 3 hours.
This game was produced by a high school student in Japan.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "I'm here to stay. But if I don't assert my presence, no one will notice me." PhobLack is a horror adventure game in which you explore a haunted ruin. In a dark and enclosed mansion, restore the ability to communicate with the outside world in order to call for rescue.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean
